attributes.action: Bus for mothers/ fathers with prams
attributes.additional_details:
Help stranded mothers or fathers waiting to get on a bus but can't as it's already full. I need 100000 signatures to put this matter to tfl
Your help would be beneficial to all

rejection.details: If the petition relates only to buses in London, then it is a matter for the Mayor of London and TfL, not central Government.  If it relates to buses across the country, you may wish to resubmit it without reference to TfL.
